changeRepositionOverride.theText: Move to a space that is not highlighted.

globalEvents.name: Open Crate 1
globalEvents.eventText:
You rummage through the supplies and take whatever seems useful.

Draw a supply card. You gain 1 medpac. Claim this token.

entityProperties.name: Crate1
entityProperties.theText: An old supply crate.

globalEvents.name: Mission Briefing
globalEvents.eventText:
Rumbles echo through the caves as you approach the underground base. Flakes of ice and stone drift from the ceiling.

{-} Deploy the heroes to the blue highlighted space.

entityProperties.name: Warning 1-1
entityProperties.theText: Ice and snow are raining from the ceiling, and rumbles echo through the cave. This part is about to cave in.

entityProperties.name: Warning 1-2
entityProperties.theText: Ice and snow are raining from the ceiling, and rumbles echo through the cave. This part is about to cave in.

entityProperties.name: Warning 1-3
entityProperties.theText: Ice and snow are raining from the ceiling, and rumbles echo through the cave. This part is about to cave in.

eventActions.theText:
There are cracks showing in the rock and ice of the cave walls. The cavern you are in looks as if it is about to collapse. You need to hurry.

{-} Yellow highlighted spaces are spaces that are about to cave in. Red highlighted spaces are caved-in spaces.
{-} At the start of each Status Phase, certain spaces cave in. Then, each figure on a red highlighted space suffers 2 {H}.
{-} All red highlighted spaces are difficult terrain.

You continually send com signals out until finally you get a response. 

"Glad you got our signal," says the team leader.

"We got what we need, but we have to stabilize our escape route, or this whole place will crash in on us! Get in there; we'll be right behind you!"

{-} Doors are locked. A figure can attack a door (Health: *2*, Defense: 1{G}). A hero can interact with a door ({K}or {I}) to open it.
{-} The mission will progress when an escape route has been found.
{-} The Rebels lose when all heroes are wounded.
Find an escape route.

{-} Doors are locked. A figure can attack a door (Health: *2*, Defense: 1{G}). A hero can interact with a door ({K}or {I}) to open it.
{-} Yellow highlighted spaces are spaces that are about to cave in. Red highlighted spaces are caved-in spaces.
{-} At the start of each Status Phase, certain spaces cave in. Then, each figure on a red highlighted space suffers 2 {H}.
{-} All red highlighted spaces are difficult terrain.
{-} The mission will progress when an escape route has been found.
{-} The Rebels lose when all heroes are wounded.

globalEvents.name: End of Mission - Rebels win
globalEvents.eventText:
"They're set! Go! Go!" you hear your men shouting. You sprint to the stabilized escape tunnel as tons of ice and stone bury the base behind you. Once you reach safety, the men you came to rescue laugh in relief and hand you a datachip of all the intel they stole from the Empire.

{-} The Rebels win the mission!
{-} Heroes receive the Echo Base Troopers as allies.
{-} Each hero receives 1 XP. Heroes receive 100 credits per hero.

globalEvents.name: End of Mission - Rebels lose
globalEvents.eventText:
The base crumbles around you in a blur of snow and rubble. You protect yourself as much as possible and crawl your way out once it has subsided, but the troops you were sent to rescue are nowhere to be found.

{-} The Rebels lose the mission.
{-} Each hero receives 1 XP. Heroes receive 100 credits per hero.

globalEvents.name: Activate Stabilizer 1
globalEvents.eventText: The stabilizer starts humming. Immediately, an energy field springs up, stabilizing the ceiling.

entityProperties.name: Stabilizer 1
entityProperties.theText:
Half buried in snow and ice, the stabilizer lies dormant. It can project a powerful energy field to stabilize the escape route.

{-} A Rebel figure can interact with a stabilizer to activate it.

entityProperties.name: Active Stabilizer 1
entityProperties.theText: The stabilizer is activated, holding up the ceiling with its energy field.

globalEvents.name: Activate Stabilizer 2
globalEvents.eventText: The stabilizer starts humming. Immediately, an energy field springs up, stabilizing the ceiling.

globalEvents.name: Open Door 1
globalEvents.eventText: You manage to pry the frozen door open.

entityProperties.name: Door 1
entityProperties.theText:
The door is partially frozen over. It will be hard to get open.

{-} The door is locked. A figure can attack a door (Health: *2*, Defense: 1{G}). A hero can interact with a door ({K}or {I}) to open it.

globalEvents.name: Open Door 2
globalEvents.eventText: You manage to pry the frozen door open.

entityProperties.name: Door 2
entityProperties.theText:
The door is partially frozen over. It will be hard to get open.

{-} The door is locked. A figure can attack a door (Health: *2*, Defense: 1{G}). A hero can interact with a door ({K}or {I}) to open it.

globalEvents.name: Combatants
globalEvents.eventText: Behind the door lies a large hallway, the floor strewn with old machinery, half buried in ice.

eventActions.theText: Enemies are already waiting for you.

globalEvents.name: Stabilization
globalEvents.eventText: The old command center of the base has fallen in disrepair.

eventActions.theText: A squad of snowtroopers who have been searching the command center turn toward you.
Stabilizers have been set up to secure the cave from collapsing, but they are inactive. If you manage to activate them, you might buy yourself enough time to escape through the tunnels.

entityProperties.name: Stabilizer 1
entityProperties.theText:
Half buried in snow and ice, the stabilizer lies dormant. It can project a powerful energy field to stabilize the escape route.

{-} A Rebel figure can interact with a stabilizer to activate it.

eventActions.theText:
{-} Imperial mission tokens represent inactive stabilizers. Rebel mission tokens represent active stabilizers. A Rebel figure can interact with a stabilizer to activate it.
{-} The Rebels win when all stabilizers have been activated.
Block access to the stabilizers.
Activate the stabilizers (&Stabilizers&/3).

{-} All red highlighted spaces are difficult terrain.
{-} Imperial mission tokens represent inactive stabilizers. Rebel mission tokens represent active stabilizers. A Rebel figure can interact with a stabilizer to activate it.
{-} The Rebels win when all stabilizers have been activated.
{-} The Rebels lose when all heroes are wounded.

eventActions.theText:
With an almighty roar, parts of the ceiling cave in.

{-} Each figure in a red highlighted space suffers 2 {H}. Red highlighted spaces are difficult terrain.

The ground is shaking, and the cave walls are creaking under the stress. Ice and rocks are raining down on you. You need to hurry.

{-} At the start of each subsequent Status Phase, {D} increases and each figure suffers 2 {H}.

{-} Red highlighted spaces are caved-in spaces.
{-} At the start of each Status Phase, {D} increases and each figure suffers 2 {H}.
{-} All red highlighted spaces are difficult terrain.
{-} Imperial mission tokens represent inactive stabilizers. Rebel mission tokens represent active stabilizers. A Rebel figure can interact with a stabilizer to activate it.
{-} The Rebels win when all stabilizers have been activated.
{-} The Rebels lose when all heroes are wounded.

globalEvents.name: Snowcrash EoR
globalEvents.eventText:
Ice and rock rains from the ceiling, striking both you and your enemies. Your time is running out.

{-} Each figure suffers 2 {H}.
